alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 29 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...Snow showers and Embedded Snow Squalls will impact portions of Clinton, Franklin, St. Lawrence and Essex Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 742 PM EDT, snow showers were reported along a line extending from near St. Regis to near Fowler to 7 miles south of Barnes Corners. Movement was east at 50 mph. Some of these snow showers will have embedded gusty winds as well as brief heavy snowfall. HAZARD...Winds 30 mph or greater, and visibility less than a half mile. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Low visibility will pose a hazard to motorists and roads will eventually become slush or snow covered and slick as temperatures fall to around freezing. Locations impacted include... Potsdam, Saranac Lake, Tupper Lake, Adirondack Regional Airport, Lake Placid, Peru, Beekmantown, Schuyler Falls, Oswegatchie, Saranac, Mooers, Moira, Altona, Bangor, Fowler, Parishville, Fort Covington, Colton, Bombay and Wilmington. This includes Interstate 87 between mile markers 82 and 107, between mile markers 152 and 153, and between mile markers 165 and 175.
info.instruction: Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Eastern Essex; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southeastern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex
